title: What are the latest business news of August 13, 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Business news #6 - August 13, 2020 1) PM Modi launches country’s first taxpayers’ charter promised in the budget  PM Modi on Thursday said that “Only 15 million in a population of 1.3 billion Indians actually pay income tax”. And added that “currently, there are approx. 70 million income-tax returns filers. And also added that we cannot ignore the fact that this [growth] is gradually increasing in a country of 130 crores. In such a large country, out of 130 crores, only 1.5 crore population deposit income-tax we should concern on it”. 2) 21.07 lakh people traveled domestically by airlines in July which is 82.3% lower than July 2019 amid COVID-19 situation.  3) Tesla Announces 5-for-1 Stock Split as Shares Soar  Each shareholder as of August 21 will receive a stock dividend of four additional shares. This is like a cash dividend but in the form of stock for stockholders. 4) Rupee settles on a flat note, down 1 paisa at 74.84 against United States dollar  5) Ford calling back over 558,000 midsize SUVs to fix possible brake fluid leaks  The recall affects of Ford select 2015-18 Ford Edge and 2016-18 Lincoln MKX vehicles including 488,594 units in the US, 62,876 in Canada, and 7,140 in Mexico. 7) Gold prices in India have increased to Rs. 52410.0 since yesterday (Rs. 52400.0). Although, it was lower than the average gold price observed this week (Rs.54367.14) by 3.6%.
